name: Become Your Shadow
description:
The man who get his hand dirty. He earned dirty money for his whole life, until today… Today, he will be testified for what is coming. Could he pass the test or he face with who you do not know? We shall see…

- Made By 6 Indie Jr. Game Developer ^^

- First group project 

How to Play?

- A-D => Movement

- LeftShift => Run

- E => Interactions

- R => Skip intro

- F => Skip chat
